# UISceneDelegateClassName

**Property List Key**

The name of the app-specific class you want UIKit to instantiate and use as the scene delegate object.

## Discussion

The delegate class you specify for [doc://com.apple.bundleresources/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/UIApplicationSceneManifest/UISceneConfigurations/CPTemplateApplicationSceneSessionRoleApplication] must adopt the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CarPlay/CPTemplateApplicationSceneDelegate] protocol.

## Scene objects

- **UISceneClassName**: The name of the scene class you want UIKit to instantiate.
